articles.description: Katherine Ryan took to Instagram on Sunday to sharedher daughter Violet's shocked reaction after she was unveiled  as Pigeon during Saturday evening's The Masked Singer.
articles.content:
Katherine Ryan  was unveiled as the star performing as Pigeon during Saturday evening's The Masked Singer.
But the Canadian comedian, 39, refused to tell her daughter Violet, 12, she was taking part… [+8741 chars]
